name: Vrsandbox
body:
### Videos and Pictures

![](images/sand.jpg)
![](images/whole.jpg)

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0UpgZvuVeoU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNU7olLehsM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

### HowTo

You can read all about it on these sites:

- [SARndbox website](http://idav.ucdavis.edu/~okreylos/ResDev/SARndbox/)
- [ARSandbox.org](https://arsandbox.org)

For calibration, you can find these links on these websites:

- [Calibaraion](https://arsandbox.ucdavis.edu/technical-resources/instructions/calibration-2/)

### Contributions

Special thanks go to

- Sven Schröter for helping to build it
- Mario Behling from FOSSASIA for the Kinect and computer
- Anonymous for the Projector
- Facility Management of the [HPI](http://hpi.de) for the wheelbarrow
- Fabian Lüpke for yet another computer
- The Shop@HPI for Screws and a Flex
- Jakob Braun for modeling in a video and providing the saw

This project is part of the [HPIMakerKlub](http://hpimakerklub.github.io/).
The initial versin was built by [Nicco Kunzmann](https://github.com/niccokunzmann) within 3 days.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
